title: WTB/WTTF: T206 Adkins, Ames (HAC), Arndt, Atz
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: T206 Adkins, Ames (HAC), Arndt, Atz
posts.post_content: Tired of seeing these four empty slots at the top of my registry.  Only looking for SGC 40s.  Have SGC graded T206s that I can trade or I can purchase.

Eric, I dont have any of the one you mentioned but I do have a SGC 40 Ritchey which I see you need also. You can see it here on page 9 I think. I have a lot of duplicates I need to get traded. lol
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/Texxxx/t206[/url]
If you have any PSA 4+ or SGC 50+ that I need I am very open to trades. Shoot me an email and I will send you a list of what I need. I will even trade for a 40 and upgrade it later if need be. Thanks Bruce
[url]texxxx58@yahoo.com[/url]

Erick,

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/frankbmd/t206[/url]

Old Mill Back 

$65 shipped, trade or offer

Frank
